src_original: te jinadharmmâtṛptaśṛṇontī [[DOUBT]] //  ye jinadharmm atṛptaśṛṇontī /  teṣv adhimukti acintiyadharmme //
tgt_original: 若信如來正真法，　　則常樂聞無厭足。 若樂聞法無厭足，　　欣悟不可思議法，

src_original: ye sada śraddha sagauravasaṃghe /  ye 'vivarttika saṃghaprasannās te 'vivarttika śraddhabalātaḥ /  ye 'vivarttika śraddhabalāto /

src_original: indriyatīkṣṇaprabhāsvara teṣām //
tgt_original: 若信堅固不可動，　　諸根明利悉清淨。

src_original: indriyatīkṣṇaprabhāsvara yeṣām tehi vivarjita pāpakamitrāḥ /
tgt_original: 若根明利悉清淨，　　則離一切惡知識，

src_original: yehi vivarjita pāpakamitrāḥ dhārmmikamitraparigraha teṣām //
tgt_original: 若能遠離惡知識，　　則能親近善知識。

src_original: te vipulaṃ kuśalôpacinvanti /  ye vipulaṃ kuśalôpacinontī hetubalôpagatāya mahâtmā //

src_original: teṣôdāradhimuktiviśeṣāḥ /  yeṣôdāradhimuktiviśeṣās te sadâdhiṣṭhita sarvajinebhiḥ //  ye sadâdhiṣṭhita sarvajinebhis teṣûpapadyati bodhayi cittam /
